video.title: Mad Men
video.synopsis: Set in 1960s New York City, this award-winning series takes a peek inside an ad agency during an era when the cutthroat business had a glamorous lure.

episodes.synopsis: In 1960s New York City, in the ego-driven Golden Age of advertising, everyone is selling something and nothing is what it seems.
episodes.title: Smoke Gets in Your Eyes

episodes.synopsis: Don continues to conceal his increasingly complicated personal life, even in the face of Roger's invitation to open up.
episodes.title: Ladies Room

episodes.synopsis: Pete returns home from his honeymoon excited about his new marriage but conflicted about his past encounter with Peggy.
episodes.title: Marriage of Figaro

episodes.synopsis: Pete's professional and personal lives become more complicated as he struggles to assert power in both.
episodes.title: New Amsterdam

episodes.synopsis: Don must deal with the fallout when a photo brings back a past he isn't ready to confront.
episodes.title: 5G

episodes.synopsis: At a brainstorming session, Peggy proves to be more than just a secretary.
episodes.title: Babylon

episodes.synopsis: Roger joins Don for an evening of dinner and drinking, during which Roger's behavior leads to a rift in their friendship.
episodes.title: Red in the Face

episodes.synopsis: Don is tormented as pieces of his secretive past begin to haunt him.
episodes.title: The Hobo Code

episodes.synopsis: A rival ad agency courts Don, using Betty in their attempt to lure him from Sterling Cooper.
episodes.title: Shoot

episodes.synopsis: Don loses an account. Roger, stuck in the city for Labor Day weekend, attempts to cheer him up.
episodes.title: Long Weekend

episodes.synopsis: Roger's work problems provide new opportunities for Don, and Pete grows more frustrated.
episodes.title: Indian Summer

episodes.synopsis: On election night, the Sterling Cooper staff pulls a rowdy all-nighter while watching the returns.
episodes.title: Nixon vs. Kennedy

episodes.synopsis: As Thanksgiving approaches, Don's work responsibilities interfere with his domestic life.
episodes.title: The Wheel

episodes.synopsis: It's Valentine's Day, and Sterling Cooper hustles to stay on top of its game, while Don and Duck find themselves at odds over an account.
episodes.title: For Those Who Think Young

episodes.synopsis: Despite a conflict of interest, Sterling Cooper aggressively pursues an airline account.
episodes.title: Flight 1

episodes.synopsis: Trouble arises on the set of a commercial while Don plays hooky from the office.
episodes.title: The Benefactor

episodes.synopsis: Freddy and Ken take a client out to lunch who stirs Roger Sterling's heart.
episodes.title: Three Sundays

episodes.synopsis: Don once again finds himself having to deal with issues between TV comedian Jimmy and his wife, Bobbie. Joan finally finds Don the perfect secretary.
episodes.title: The New Girl

episodes.synopsis: Don and Duck take a stab at making peace. Peggy tries to insinuate herself into the execs' after-hours meetings. Duck deals with a family visit.
episodes.title: Maidenform

episodes.synopsis: Don's secretary makes a grave error that spells trouble for Joan. Cooper has a new piece of art in his office that attracts the employees' interest.
episodes.title: The Gold Violin

episodes.synopsis: Father Gill convinces Peggy to contribute to a pro bono project. To win the business of an imported beer, Duck and Don appeal to a new demographic.
episodes.title: A Night to Remember

episodes.synopsis: Freddy disappoints his team during a pitch. Pete finds an opportunity at the office he can exploit, while Don proves his loyalty to an old friend.
episodes.title: Six-Month Leave

episodes.synopsis: Betty visits her ailing father. Sheila tries to convince Paul to prioritize his civic duties. Pete's mother disapproves of Pete and Trudy's plans.
episodes.title: The Inheritance

episodes.synopsis: In Los Angeles, Don acquaints himself with exciting new friends. Peggy looks for romance at work. Duck thinks about the future of Sterling Cooper.
episodes.title: The Jet Set

episodes.synopsis: Don meets with an old friend. An account hangs in the balance when Pete's personal life presents problems. Joan brings her boyfriend to the office.
episodes.title: The Mountain King

episodes.synopsis: Sterling Cooper's future is uncertain and the office scrambles without Don. Betty learns some disconcerting news.
episodes.title: Meditations in an Emergency

episodes.synopsis: Pete and Ken are among those impacted by the corporate changes at the firm. Meanwhile, Sal accompanies Don on a business trip.
episodes.title: Out of Town

episodes.synopsis: Betty's father visits. The firm contemplates an unusual client request. Roger arranges a wedding. Peggy is greatly affected by a campaign.
episodes.title: Love Among the Ruins

episodes.synopsis: A mandatory overtime session leaves the writers staving off late-night boredom. Roger throws a party, and Joan and Greg host one of their own.
episodes.title: My Old Kentucky Home

episodes.synopsis: Don crosses paths with his father-in-law, Peggy looks for a new roommate, and a wealthy client is excited about doing business with the firm.
episodes.title: The Arrangements

episodes.synopsis: Pete works a new angle into his business dealings. Concern over Sally's behavior causes Don and Betty to act, and a dream has an odd effect on Betty.
episodes.title: The Fog

episodes.synopsis: An unexpected visitor shows up at Sterling Cooper, Sally gets spooked by something (or someone), and Joan is the recipient of some surprising news.
episodes.title: Guy Walks into an Advertising Agency

episodes.synopsis: Betty becomes involved in local politics. A troubling incident leads Don to think about his future, and Peggy receives an exquisite gift.
episodes.title: Seven Twenty Three

episodes.synopsis: Don decides to include Betty on a company business trip, and Pete lends a hand to a neighbor in his apartment building.
episodes.title: Souvenir

episodes.synopsis: Client satisfaction proves to be difficult for both Don and Sal; Betty decides to host a fund-raiser.
episodes.title: Wee Small Hours

episodes.synopsis: Sterling Cooper celebrates a company milestone; Peggy competes with Paul for an account.
episodes.title: The Color Blue

episodes.synopsis: Sterling Cooper welcomes back a prodigal client; Betty and the children take a trip; Joan and Greg make plans for their future.
episodes.title: The Gypsy and the Hobo

episodes.synopsis: A candidate makes an impression on Don, Peggy's taste in men proves questionable, and Pete faces a major decision about his career.
episodes.title: The Grown Ups

episodes.synopsis: Don has a pivotal meeting with Connie, Betty is the beneficiary of some interesting advice, and Pete has a serious sit-down with Don and Roger.
episodes.title: Shut the Door. Have a Seat.

episodes.synopsis: Don's reluctance to talk about himself jettisons a prestigious trade-paper interview that the company was hoping would be a boon to business.
episodes.title: Public Relations

episodes.synopsis: The agency's Christmas party is nearly spoiled by the late arrival of a surprise and not-so-welcome visitor.
episodes.title: Christmas Comes but Once a Year

episodes.synopsis: Don makes a jaunt to Acapulco, while back at the office, Lane and Joan get into a serious disagreement.
episodes.title: The Good News

episodes.synopsis: An edict from Roger and Lane puts Pete in a personal dilemma.
episodes.title: The Rejected

episodes.synopsis: Don and Pete disregard Roger's expectations in an effort to land an important new client.
episodes.title: The Chrysanthemum and the Sword

episodes.synopsis: Peggy clashes with her new creative partner, and Don pitches under unusual circumstances.
episodes.title: Waldorf Stories

episodes.synopsis: A deadline disrupts Sterling Cooper Draper Pryce.
episodes.title: The Suitcase

episodes.synopsis: Peggy and Joan are forced to deal with some rambunctious office shenanigans.
episodes.title: The Summer Man

episodes.synopsis: A romantic gesture in the form of a thoughtful gift could lead to professional problems for Peggy.
episodes.title: The Beautiful Girls

episodes.synopsis: Betty is a bit unsettled when a surprise visitor stops at the Francis home.
episodes.title: Hands and Knees

episodes.synopsis: An all-hands meeting is called for the employees of Sterling Cooper Draper Pryce, and the gossip starts to fly.
episodes.title: Chinese Wall

episodes.synopsis: While trying to navigate a crisis, Don encounters an old friend.
episodes.title: Blowing Smoke

episodes.synopsis: In the Season 4 finale, a surprising opportunity rears its head for both Don and Peggy, leaving them with life-altering decisions to make.
episodes.title: Tomorrowland

episodes.synopsis: Don's young bride serves up a sexy surprise for his birthday, witnessed by all of Sterling Cooper Draper Pryce, in the Season 5 premiere.
episodes.title: A Little Kiss

episodes.synopsis: As Sterling Cooper Draper Pryce tries to build upon its current business, Peggy is given new responsibility while Don and Harry indulge a client.
episodes.title: Tea Leaves

episodes.synopsis: Don runs into someone from his past; Joan makes a decision; and Roger gives Peggy extra work.
episodes.title: Mystery Date

episodes.synopsis: Lane strikes up an interesting friendship as Pete entertains guests.
episodes.title: Signal 30

episodes.synopsis: Peggy is rattled by a particularly difficult pitch while Don visits a potential client.
episodes.title: Far Away Places

episodes.synopsis: Don, Roger and Pete attempt to bring in new business while Sally comes to the aid of a relative.
episodes.title: At the Codfish Ball

episodes.synopsis: Peggy is irritated by a secret she has to keep; Pete covers for a friend; and Don gets unexpected news.
episodes.title: Lady Lazarus

episodes.synopsis: Don becomes competitive while Sally faces a challenge; Roger seeks new business.
episodes.title: Dark Shadows

episodes.synopsis: Christmas wishes come true as everyone gets a gift; Harry helps out a friend.
episodes.title: Christmas Waltz

episodes.synopsis: Don's challenged by a pitch; Peggy contemplates a trip; and Joan entertains an idea.
episodes.title: The Other Woman

episodes.synopsis: Don follows a surprising lead while Sally goes out.
episodes.title: Commissions and Fees

episodes.synopsis: In the Season 5 finale, opportunity is in the air for everyone while Pete meets a stranger on the train.
episodes.title: The Phantom

episodes.synopsis: In the Season 6 premiere, Don spearheads a new campaign, Roger gets some unsettling news and Betty takes in a houseguest.
episodes.title: The Doorway

episodes.synopsis: Don clashes with a client. Pete entertains a guest. Peggy struggles to motivate the staff.
episodes.title: Collaborators

episodes.synopsis: The partners work to keep the wraps on a secret campaign. Joan is visited by an old friend.
episodes.title: To Have and to Hold

episodes.synopsis: Peggy plans for the future. Roger courts a potential client.
episodes.title: The Flood

episodes.synopsis: Roger changes tack to make new business. Pete has an awkward run-in with a client.
episodes.title: For Immediate Release

episodes.synopsis: The agency tries to placate competing clients. Pete is blindsided by an unexpected guest.
episodes.title: Man With a Plan

episodes.synopsis: Don is disrupted by a surprise visitor. Peggy looks for inspiration.
episodes.title: The Crash

episodes.synopsis: Roger is plagued by a recurring dream. Joan goes to the beach.
episodes.title: The Better Half

episodes.synopsis: The agency works to hold onto a client. Joan is caught off guard.
episodes.title: A Tale of Two Cities

episodes.synopsis: Betty plans for Sally's future. Peggy encounters trouble at home.
episodes.title: Favors

episodes.synopsis: The partners disagree on a new campaign. Don takes a day off.
episodes.title: The Quality of Mercy

episodes.synopsis: Amid personal and professional turmoil, Don considers relocating to California.
episodes.title: In Care Of

episodes.synopsis: Don flies out to Los Angeles to try to save his marriage, and a spiritual awakening leads to reconciliation between Roger and Margaret.
episodes.title: Time Zones

episodes.synopsis: Peggy makes an awkward Valentine's Day blunder, Cutler helps Joan move up in the world, and two secrets help Don and Sally forge a connection.
episodes.title: A Day's Work

episodes.synopsis: After being tossed out by Megan, Don leverages his way back into employment with SC&P. Betty tries to bond with Bobby during his class field trip.
episodes.title: Field Trip

episodes.synopsis: Peggy must supervise Don when she takes charge of an important new account, and Roger tries to retrieve runaway Margaret from a hippie commune.
episodes.title: The Monolith

episodes.synopsis: Don strong-arms his way onto an account in order to cement his position at SC&P, and Henry pressures Betty to tone down her political views.
episodes.title: The Runaways

episodes.synopsis: Bob proposes to Joan when he learns he's up for a new job, and Peggy confesses her insecurities to Don regarding the campaign for her new account.
episodes.title: The Strategy

episodes.synopsis: Cutler and Roger jostle over the future of SC&P -- and Don's place in it. Megan is ready to give up on her marriage, and Ted has a breakdown.
episodes.title: Waterloo
